description: Uses an LLM to generate a function for filtering or transforming structured data.

inputs.name: data
inputs.info: The structured data to filter or transform using a lambda function.

inputs.name: llm
inputs.info: Connect the 'Language Model' output from your LLM component here.

inputs.name: filter_instruction
inputs.info: Natural language instructions for how to filter or transform the data using a lambda function. Example: Filter the data to only include items where the 'status' is 'active'.

inputs.name: sample_size
inputs.info: For large datasets, number of items to sample from head/tail.

inputs.name: max_size
inputs.info: Number of characters for the data to be considered large.
